document_data.caption: A map of Taak Lake and the area around it.
document_data.name: Taak Lake
document_data.mainbody: '''Taak Lake''' was a small, fresh-water lake in [[Alpuk]] north of the [[Cold Lands]].
document_data.Geography: Taak Lake was located off of the [[Utaak Stream]], at the base of the [[Lugsaas Chain]] near the gap in those mountains that led to the village of [[Ishe]] in [[Vaasa]]. It was southwest of the [[Iulutiun]] village of [[Puttak]].
document_data.History: Prior to the 15{{Th}} century [[DR]], Taak Lake was on the [[Great Glacier]]. It was frozen most of the year since it was only {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} at its deepest point and because of the bitter cold of the region.{{Cite dungeon/177/Realmslore: Vaasa|81-82}}
